auth.loginRequiredMessage: Sorry, you need to log in first.
auth.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.
auth.loginError: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.signOutError: Sign out failed. Please try again.
auth.verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent to your email address.
auth.verificationEmailMessage: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please click the link to verify your account before signing in.
auth.checkSpamFolder: If you don't see the email, please check your spam/junk folder.
auth.emailVerificationSuccess: Email verified successfully! You can now sign in to your account.
auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before signing in. Check your inbox for the verification link.
auth.emailAlreadyVerifiedMessage: Sorry, your email is already verified. If this is your account, please sign in using your existing credentials.
auth.verificationEmailResent: Verification email has been resent to your email address.
auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we verify your email address...
auth.emailVerifiedMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
auth.redirectingToLogin: Redirecting you to the login page in 3 seconds...
auth.verificationFailedMessage: We couldn't verify your email. The link may have expired or is invalid.
auth.emailAlreadyRegistered: This email is already registered. Please sign in to your account instead.
auth.loginToAccess: Please log in to access this page
auth.loginToCheckout: Please log in to proceed with checkout
auth.loginToViewProfile: Please log in to view your profile
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetSent: We've sent password reset instructions to your email address.
